summary: An overhaul on some of the Dawnguard weapon stats. Nothing fancy.
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t really like alot of things with the Dawnguard, one of things were the weak stats on some weapons. So I tweaked them to my liking. Do note I made the changes with Master difficulty inmind, so these new stats will most likely be quite godlike on lower difficulty settings. You\'ve been warned.

Harkon\'s Sword (Now: The Vampiric Blade)
Damage: 14
Crit damage: 7
Permanent charge (meaning it doesn\'t use charges, like eg the Ebony Blade)
Absorb 25 Health
Absorb 25 Magicka
Absorb 25 Stamina
Fixed: It now actually says 25 points and not the original 15 (silly me)

Crossbow
Damage: 30
Crit damage: 15

Dwarven Crossbow
Damage: 35
Crit damage: 17

Auriel\'s Bow
Damage: 25
Crit Damage: 13
Permanent charge (just like the Ebony Blade)

New: Enchanced Crossbow
Damage: 33
Crit Damage: 16

New: Enhanced Dwarven Crossbow
Damage: 38
Crit damage: 19

I will probably add new tweaks as I progress further.
author: Lhamaria
